properties.title: Voralphütte SAC
properties.description: A versatile cabin for one-day tourists, families and climbers. Voralptal, a secluded side valley of Göschenertal, is well-known for its flora and fauna and, especially, for its richness of crystals. Two climbing parks nearby and the popular alpine «Fünf-Hütten-Panoramaweg» (five cabin panorama trail), partly a via farrata, which crosses the spectacular Salbit suspension bridge, contribute to the cabin’s popularity. In winter it can be used on a selection of ski and snowshoe tours.
